api-platform
************


Description
===========

Control Plane designed to manage lifecycle of CLIP Instances


Available Commands
==================

* api-platform-instance

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * update

* api-platform-instance-collection

  * list-api-platform-instances

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list-work-request-logs
